CustomField.description: Background image to be used during survey response.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify a background image to be displayed in the survey response interface. This customization option allows you to enhance the visual aesthetics of the survey by adding a visually appealing background image. Choose an image that aligns with your branding or the theme of the survey to create a more engaging and immersive experience for participants.
CustomField.label: Background Image
